label: AB6C3_hP20_182_b_i_af-001
title: PbTa$_{2}$S$_{6}$ Structure
comments:
The ICSD lists the prototype for this system as enargite (in its \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C6_hP20_182_c_af_i-001}{$P6_{3}22$ form}), but if that were the case the lead atom would be on the (2c) site rather than the (2b) site. 
 (Eppinga, 1980) show a similar structure, but they set $z_{3}$ = 0, which puts the structure in the centrosymmetric space group $P6_{3}/mcm$ \#193. (Fang, 1996) set $z_{3}$ = -0.002, which is just enough to keep the system in space group $P6_{3}22$ \#182.
